blogs.title: Measuring Emotions in Medical Education Research
blogs.summary: Many scholars now acknowledge that the road to becoming a doctor is an emotional journey. Dr. Laura Naismith and I recently published a commentary in the journal Medical Education. In the article we discuss the measurement of emotion in medical e

author.description: Advancing health professions education through leadership and innovative scholarship.
